So sick of this mangaka, make them fuck already plz! The art is so wonderful and the fact that they haven't fucked is the most annoying aspect of this whole series. Hate this mangaka hope their publisher reassigns their work to somebody who will actually give the readers what they want.

@Kamenlobster
Firsy, This entire website is a scraper website. Meaning it copies everything that gets uploaded to exhentai. That is to say, whenever a series gets updated, instead of filling in the corresponding post, it just creates a new one over here.

Play this series isn't even over yet in the author updates it every once in awhile. 

But like I said again, this website is a scraper and it's too stupid to realize it should merge them but instead create a new section every time

A bunch of pages in Japanese, then vatches of ~7 bathhouse pages in japanese with random badly colorized pages followed by those same pages in questionably translated english, then sometimes there'll be pages with no text, then finally some new content in japanese and then english.

Still a clusterfuck of an upload.

Are you guys actually retarded? the first ~90 pages aren’t translated. it’s not “Japanese first, then English”, it’s “90 pages of untranslated Japanese tagged as English, and then extra content that’s *actually* Japanese, then English”.
@sinohn You are brain dead already, watched too much porn did this with you.Poor man

for those who complain about the translation, you have it first in Japanese and then in English
